job.title: Senior Software Engineer
job.industry: Hospital & Health Care,Health, Wellness and Fitness,Medical Devices
job.description: ltpgtltstronggtSummary ltstronggtltpgtltpgtOur client a successful Medical Device company is seeking a talented Senior Software Engineer to join their team This exciting company is well known for their innovative and collaborative approach to deliver fresh breakthrough technology to power the future of healthcare In this role as a Senior Software Engineer you will apply technical expertise towards developing worldclass solutions using software engineering tools to solve complex technical problems related to surgical navigation robotics and ablation products This role would require either relocation or commute to office near Denver Colorado area ltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtJob ResponsibilitiesltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtDesign develop test and document complex software components and applications related to surgical navigation robotics and ablation products using C andor CltligtltligtTroubleshoot debug maintain and support existing productsltligtltligtExecute on key success metrics in engineering and product roadmapltligtltligtWork in an Agile team environmentltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtSkills Requiredltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligt4 years of professional engineering experienceltligtltligtProven expertise in C andor C with NET frameworkltligtltligtExperience with other programming languages Python Go JavaltligtltligtExperience in largescale software design including OOAOOD and design patternsltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtContact DetailsltstronggtltpgtltpgtThe full job description and company details are available upon application This position is being handled by James at Meet call 1 628 3362774 or email jamesgiustipeoplewithchemistrycom to discuss further and in confidenceltpgt
